definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: a standing tree Ge 18:4, Ge 18:8 (J) +, Ex 15:25 (J; of shrub ?), Je 17:18 = Ps 1:3 (sim.); to be felled De 19:5, 2Ki 6:6; [[הָעֵחִים]] (appar. incl. vine and bramble) in allegory Ju Jdg 9:8 + 6 t. Ju Jdg 9; [[עֵץ הַחַיִּים]] † Ge 2:9, Ge 3:22, Ge 3:24 (J), cf. [[עַל־עֵץ רַעֲנׇן]] Je 17:2; [[כָּל־עַץ עָבׂת]] Ez Eze 20:28.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: coll. trees, [[עֵץ־הַגׇּן]] Ge 2:16, Ge 3:1, Ge 3:2, Ge 3:8 (all J); usu. later, ´[[י]] Ge 1:12, Ge 1:29, Ge 1:29 (P), +; [[עֵץ פְּרִי]] fruit-bearing trees Ge 1:11 (P), Ps 148:9, cf. Ec 2:5, [[פְּרי עֵץ]] Ex 10:15 (J), Ez Eze 36:30, Le 23:40 (H), cf. Joe 2:22; [[עֵץ־מַאֲכָל]] De 20:20, Le 19:23 (H), Ez Eze 47:12, Ne 9:25; [[עֵץ הַזַּיִת]] Hag 2:19 olive trees, [[עֵץ שֶׁמֶן]] Ne 8:15, [[עֵץ־שָָׁמֶן]] Is 41:19; [[סֲבָח־עֵץ]] Ps 74:5 thicket of trees; [[עֵץ הַשָּׂרֶה]] Ex 9:25 (J), +; [[עֵץ הַיַּעַר]] † Ez Eze 15:6, cf. Is 10:19, Is 44:23; [[כִּימֵי הָעֵץ]] Is 65:22 (sim. of great age).

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: pl. of trees felled for building, 1Ki 5:6, 1Ki 5:18 (+ [[אֲבָנִים]]); [[עֲחֵי אֲרָזִים]] 2Sa 5:11 = 1Ch 14:1 + 7 t.; [[עֲחֵי בְרוֹשִׁים]] 1Ki 52:22, 1Ki 52:24, 1Ki 9:11; (´[[אַלְגּ]])[[עֲחֵי לְמֻגִּים ]], v. ´[[אַלְגּ]] p. 38 supr.
(c. 175 t.; c. 120 t. pl., to denote pieces [or articles] of wood)

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: wood, as material; for building, 2Ki 12:13 (+ [[אַבְנֵי מַתְחֵב]]), 2Ki 22:6 = 2Ch 34:11 (both + id.), Ne 2:8 +; [[עֲחֵי שָָׁמֶן]] 1Ki 6:23, 1Ki 6:31, 1Ki 6:33 cf. v:1Ki 6:32; [[עֲחֵי־גּׁפֶר]] Ge 6:14 (Noah's ark), [[עֲחֵי שִׁטִּים]] Ex 25:5, Ex 25:10 + 20 t. Ex (of tabern. and its furniture; all P) De 10:3; [[מִגְדַּל־עֵץ]] Ne 8:4; [[מוֹטִת עֵץ]] Je 28:13 (in fig.; opp. [[בַּרְזֶל]] ´[[מ]]); [[כְּלִי־עֵץ]] article of wood Le 11:32, Le 15:12, Nu 31:20, cf. Nu 35:18 (all P). Hence

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: [[עֵחִים]] = articles of wood Ex 7:19 (P; ‖[[אֲבָנִים]]), 1Ch 29:2; so [[עֲחֵי בְרוֹשִׁים]] 2Sa 6:5 (but v. [[בְּרוֹשׁ]] ad fin); specif. [[הָעֵץ]] = helve of axe De 19:5; ([[וֹ]])[[עֵץ חֲנִית]] 1Sa 17:7 Qr (Kt [[חֵץ]]) = 1Ch 20:5, 2Sa 21:19, 2Sa 23:7; [[עֲחֵי]] [[הָעֲגׇלָה]] 1Sa 6:14 (i.e. wood of which cart was made), [[עֲחֵי הָאֲשֵׁרָה]] Ju Jdg 6:26; esp. timbers of a house Zec 5:4, Hb Hab 2:11, Le 14:45, of a city 1Ki 15:22 = 2Ch 16:5, Ez Eze 26:12; [[עֵץ]] of pole on which bodies of slain (criminals and others) were exposed (perhaps orig. trees) Ge 40:19 (E), Jos 8:29, Jos 8:29, Jos 10:26, Jos 10:26, Jos 10:27 (all JE), De 21:22, De 21:23; late (in Pers.) used for executing criminals (? by hanging = gallows), [[תָּלָח עַל־עֵץ]] Es 2:23 + 8 t. Est. † c. of idols, [[עֵץ וׇאֶבֶן]] De 4:28, De 28:36, De 28:64, De 29:16, 2Ki 19:18 = Is 37:19, Ez Eze 20:32, cf. Je 2:27, Je 3:9, Hb Hab 2:19; so [[עֵץ]] alone Ho 4:12, Is 40:20, cf. Is 44:19, Is 45:20; [[אֲשֵׁרָה כָּל־עֵץ]] De 16:21.

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: (fire-) wood Jos 9:23, Jos 9:27 (J), v:Jos 9:21 (P), De 19:5 Is 30:33 +, rd. [[עֵחִים]] also Ez Eze 24:5 (for MT [[עחמים]]) Bö Ew Sm Co Berthol Toy; esp. for sacrifices 1Ki 18:23, 1Ki 18:23 +, Ge 22:7, Ge 22:9, Ge 22:9, Le 1:7 + 6 t. Lv (all P), 2Sa 24:22 ‖ 1Ch 21:23, +; [[עֲחֵי עוֹלָה]] Ge 22:3, Ge 22:6 (P).

definitions.title: e.
definitions.body: [[אֶרֶז]]([[הָ]])[[עֵץ ]] cedar-wood, used in purifications Le 14:4, Le 14:6, Le 14:49, Le 14:51, Le 14:52, Nu 19:6 (all P).

definitions.title: f.
definitions.body: [[פִּשְׁתֵּי הָעֵץ]] Jos 2:6 woody-flax, i.e. flax on the stalk.—Je 10:8 Gie prop. [[הֶבֶל מׂעֲחׂתָו]] for MT [[הֲבָלִים עִץ הוּא]].—[[מׂאֶסֶת כָּל־עֵץ]] Ez Eze 21:15 is dub., Sm prop. [[מָאֵסְתָּ כָל־עֵץ]], Co [[מׂאֲסֵי כָל־עׂז]], Berthol [[וּמְנַסֵּף כָּל־עַז]]; Siegf:Kau Toy leave untranslated.
